TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebBrowserNavigatingEventHandler(object sender, WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebBrowserNavigatingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebBrowserNavigatingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs)
public delegate void WebBrowserNavigatingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebBrowserNavigatingEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件，以取消瀏覽網頁表單未被填入。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to cancel navigation when a Web page form has not been filled in. 屬性用來判斷表單輸入的欄位是否包含值。The property is used to determine whether the form input field contains a value. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserMisc#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/CS/WebBrowserMisc.cs#30)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserMisc#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/vb/WebBrowserMisc.vb#30)]
